scripts.dev:http: cross-env NODE_ENV=http_devlopment  nodemon ./app.js  && echo "nodemon app.js --dev-- successfully started"
scripts.dev:https: cross-env NODE_ENV=https_devlopment  nodemon ./app.js  && echo "nodemon app.js --dev-- successfully started"
scripts.preview:http: cross-env NODE_ENV=http_preview nodemon start ./app.js && echo "nodemon app.js--preview-- successfully started"
scripts.preview:https: cross-env NODE_ENV=https_preview nodemon start ./app.js && echo "nodemon app.js--preview-- successfully started"
scripts.start:http_pm2: cross-env NODE_ENV=http_production pm2 start ./app.js && echo "pm2 app.js--production-- successfully started"
scripts.prod:https_pm2: cross-env NODE_ENV=https_production pm2 start ./app.js && echo "pm2 app.js--production-- successfully started"
